name: Wild joust
description:
Rock paper scissors goats!!!

Got a bone to pick with a friend and a craving for good old-fashioned playground games? Then challenge your friends to this pixelated joust. Become the lord of these woods and fight as a deer or embody the ruler of a faraway land and ram away. Let the wild jousts begin!!!

 

  • Perfect for a quick match between friends

  • A bit of nostalgia and lots of jousting

  • Small arcade game with pixel art style

  • Deers, goats and more jousting beasties to come!
